forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 68, with temperatures falling to around 66 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 21 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 57. West southwest wind 10 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

weather_report:
As evening settles over Downtown San Francisco, a thick blanket of cloud drapes the city, rendering the skyline a hazy silhouette against the twilight. High gusts of wind, carrying the chill of the Pacific, dance through the streets, contrasting with the warmth lingering from a mostly sunny afternoon that graced the area just hours before. With temperatures dipping to the mid-fifties, the air feels cool and brisk, urging residents to pull their light jackets close and enjoy the companionship of knitted scarves. 

The fading light reveals patches of fog creeping its way towards the Bay, hinting at the gentle embrace of the marine layer that characterizes the evening here. This veil softens streetlights and obscures the distant contours of the Golden Gate Bridge, offering a sense of mystery to the familiar landscape. It’s a perfect opportunity for a leisurely stroll along the Embarcadero, where the mingling fragrances of food vendors beckon, or perhaps a quiet moment in one of the elevated parks, watching the city slowly light up under a shroud of clouds. Let the evening unfold gently, with comfort and warmth as your guides.
